sentences: Hannah Lux Davis (born May 17, 1986) is an American music video, commercial and film director known for her work with a variety of artists, most notably Ariana Grande, Katy Perry, Demi Lovato, Ava Max, Nicki Minaj, Drake, Miley Cyrus, Jessie J, Halsey, Christina Aguilera, Charli XCX, David Guetta, Anne-Marie, Fifth Harmony and Avril Lavigne.
She left Seattle for Los Angeles at age 18, where she enrolled in the New York Film Academy, and the Los Angeles Film School a year later.
Davis graduated from the Los Angeles Film School in 2006, and went into music video production.
The first video she was paid to direct was for Twin Atlantic in 2010.
